attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of the olympics coming to britain is too great. By spending £9bn on the olympics in London, the rest of the country loses out on the good causes that money could have gone to and is a large tax burden for the millions of people paying for it and is also a hindrance to the development of other good causes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
